problems.title: Brush Not Spinning / Squealing Sound
solution_steps: Oreck belts stretch over time. Replace every 6 months.
Remove the bottom plate (Phillips screws) and loop on a new belt.

problems.title: Dust Blowing Out of Bag
problems.description: Cloud of dust when turning on.
solution_steps: Check if the paper bag is attached to the inlet pipe.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the issue on a Commercial XL Upright (XL2100RHS)?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement part typically costs significantly less than a new $600 vacuum, and extending the life of your Oreck is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Commercial XL Upright (XL2100RHS) needs a new part?
faqs.answer: Common signs include intermittent power and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the part on my Commercial XL Upright (XL2100RHS) myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
